book.synopsis: Returning to his hometown of Bramwell after years of wandering, mercenary Darrick Lang discovers that a dark and horrifying force has ensnared its citizens and now seeks to seize him, in a chilling novel of dark fantasy, based on the popular video game. Original. (A Blizzard Entertainment M-rated electronic game) (Horror)
book.dimensions: Height: 7 Inches, Length: 4.5 Inches, Weight: 0.4 Pounds, Width: 1 Inches
